GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles sorted by newest first

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles/:id.description: serves the article corresponding to the id provided

GET /api/articles/:id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments posted on the article corresponding to the id provided

comments.body: This morning, I showered for nine minutes
comments.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of all comments posted on the article corresponding to the id provided

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Posts comment to article_id and returns a newComment object

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes the specified comment from the comments database
